title: Require Password to Disable Password Protect
author: balrammishra
body_snippet:
I noticed that when a password is set to encrypt connection configurations or the application, anyone can disable it without restriction.

Could we add an option that requires entering the current password before disabling the password protect feature?

comments.snippet:
> what version you are reffering?

I checked latest release as well as stable version, every version have this issue.
